channel.title: How-toes on Douglas Hellinger
channel.description: Recent content in How-toes on Douglas Hellinger

item.title: Create a Docs as Code Build Pipeline
item.description: Before you publish written content, you wanna check spelling, lint markdown, improve prose, and fix broken links. This approach uses a builder image specialised for your docs-as-code workflow.

item.title: How to Enable HDMI on Thinkpad X1 Extreme Gen 4
item.description: You’re running Ubuntu on a Thinkpad X1 Extreme (Gen 4). You wanna use HDMI, but the TV or monitor says something like “Check Device Power”.
